title: FATAL ERROR - WadFile mount failed: Global.wad ??
body:
Hi ! I have been facing the same problem as everyone after the 6.15 Patch 
Here is a part of my logs :
000000.000| ALWAYS| Logging started at 2016-07-27T19:17:24.094
000000.008|   OKAY| Unable to process data overlay file ./ToolsConfig.xml, defaulting to overlay now
000000.008| ALWAYS| Data overlay start folder initialized to DATA, Content/Src
000000.008| ALWAYS| Global logging level set to   WARN
000000.008| ALWAYS| GameClock LockToSystemClock time: 0.000000 diff: 0.008462
000000.008| ALWAYS| Build Version: Version 6.15.152.1763 (Jul 21 2016/01:36:27) [PUBLIC]  ChangeList: 1521763
000000.056| ALWAYS| Performing WSAStartup
000000.061| ALWAYS| Started System Init
000000.061| ALWAYS| Maestro Init
000000.061| ALWAYS| Started ReplayDownloadManager thread.
000000.061| ALWAYS| ReplayDownloader: ==== Fetch MetaData Phase ====
000000.061| ALWAYS| ---- Waiting to fetch 5000
000000.063| ALWAYS| Maestro completed init
000000.063| ALWAYS| zip manifest, 'ClientZips.txt', not found (expected).
000000.063| ALWAYS| WadFile mount: DATA/FINAL/Global.wad (FAILED)
000000.063|  ERROR| Assertion failed!

Expression: ALE-18967997

Description: FATAL ERROR - WadFile mount failed: Global.wad
000000.246|  ERROR| Crash Occurred

Need help guys as after Reinstalling and reparing still facing the same prob :'( {{champion:32}} {{item:3151}} 
Hope someone could help with the "WadFile error"
Btw the application is not pinned !

replies.body: The logs provided here aren't offering a whole lot for me to work with, and I'm not exactly sure what issue you're experiencing.  Can you provide some more details on the actual issue, where it's happening, or any error messages received?  Looking forward to your response and helping out!

It's happening after the 6.15 patcher 
After Champion select 
Sure I received an message about reporting a bug
There were 4 files 
Crash: window with msg "Wouuups somthing gone wrong game crash- file repord"
I restart LoL client
Game client say "corrupted files detected" and start to make an update.

I did the Reinstalling and the repairing but the crash still persisting

Thanks for following up with me and the troubleshooting so far.  Do you have your LoL icon pinned to your taskbar, and opening it that way?  We're currently tracking an issue where this might cause the game to crash when loading.  Information and steps on a fix can be found in our current [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Let me know!

No it's not pinned ... I'm opening it from the original file 
I've been following the service status but still no help :'(

We'd like to help you out individually to get to the bottom of this.  [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us, and our tech team will respond as soon as possible.  Also gather a set of logs with our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to help give more context on this.  Thanks for your patience!

Request Submitted 
Thanks for your time Sir ^^
Hope it'll be fixed soon
PLEASE TELL ME IF IT IS FIXED!!! I HAVE SAME PROBLEM!!!
got someone else also having this problem today.
